Title: Relates to special restrictions on campaign contributions for district attorney candidates
Summary: Relates to special restrictions on campaign contributions for district attorney candidates; requires such candidates to disclose to the board of elections the acceptance of campaign contributions from any law firm that represents defendants in criminal proceedings in any court in the state or from any licensed attorney employed by such law firm.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to special restrictions on campaign contributions for district attorney candidates
